entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
